entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
